short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overwrites GitHub.com css rules related to width so that it can fit a narrow browser screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension which makes GitHub.com fit a narrow browser window. It overwrites GitHub.com css rules related to width. 

All source code can be found on GitHub: https://github.com/PiotrBerebecki/github-responsive-width-layout
Please let me know via GitHub issues if you have ideas how the extension could be improved.
